name: ...Two Birds With One Stone
description:
As a farmer who still has not seen the worst of the upcoming global warming threats, you are going to protect the valued field from the blood-lust crows, with the use of a one (and only) stone. Good luck!

Use [WASD] to move, your mouse to pick up and throw
No birds are actually killed in the game, they are just scared away
Warning: mouse controls are very sensitive in the WebGL version.

Credits

Special thanks for helping to come up with a backstory to Vivian Truong

Sounds - freesound.org: "Hit Impact" Mrguff, "Bell, Counter, A.wav" InspectorJ, "Bell6.wav" juskiddink, "Wind, Realistic, A.wav" InspectorJ, "swipe-whoosh" qubodup 
Music - freemusicarchive.org: "Impact Prelude" Kevin MacLeod
